en.name: SpeechFX DECtalk
en.description: A command that is narrated using the DECtalk text to speech technology, powered by [MSS's webservice](https://talk.moustacheminer.com)

examples.description: Play the specific DECtalk sound with an ID. Check for all IDs [here](https://talk.moustacheminer.com/lib.html)

examples.var: [:phone on]mamma mia, poppa pia, baby got the dy[aa<999,999>]reeeeeeeeeaaaaaaaaaa

pi.name: Yer captain speaking!
pi.description: Yer [website](https://talk.moustacheminer.com) now speaks for the ship!

examples.var: [:phone on]mamma mia, poppa pia, baby got the dy[aa<999,999>]reeeeeeeeeaaaaaaaaaa
